column2: Our destination, the Class M Beta Cassius planet known simply as Haven.
column3: Our destination, the Class M Beta Cassius planet known simply as Haven.

column2: It is a world so renowned for its peaceful beauty that some believe it to have mystical healing powers.
column3: It is a world so renowned for its peaceful beauty that some believe it to have mystical healing powers.

column2: Legends say it has been known to mend souls and heal broken hearts.
column3: Legends say it has been known to mend souls and heal broken hearts.

column2: Legends like that are the spice of the universe, Mr.
column3: Legends like that are the spice of the universe, Mr.

column2: Data, because they have a way of sometimes coming true.
column3: Data, because they have a way of sometimes coming true.

column2: The surface station approval coming in now, Lieutenant.
column3: The surface station approval coming in now, Lieutenant.

column2: These are the voyages of the Starship Enterprise, its continuing mission to explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no one has gone before.
column3: These are the voyages of the Starship Enterprise, its continuing mission to explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no one has gone before.

column2: Will you and your husband be staying with the ship, Counselor?
column3: Will you and your husband be staying with the ship, Counselor?

column2: I'll just say congratulations for now, Diana.
column3: I'll just say congratulations for now, Diana.

column2: I'm Jean-Luc Picard, Captain of the Enterprise.
column3: I'm Jean-Luc Picard, Captain of the Enterprise.

column2: You can see your quarters now, if you like.
column3: You can see your quarters now, if you like.

column2: Will you show the Millers to their accommodations, please?
column3: Will you show the Millers to their accommodations, please?

column2: And I shall join you later.
column3: And I shall join you later.

column2: Two more are ready to beam in, sir.
column3: Two more are ready to beam in, sir.

column2: Wyatt seems a fine young man.
column3: Wyatt seems a fine young man.

column2: What has this life done to you?
column3: What has this life done to you?

column2: Your daughter has explained your telepathic abilities.
column3: Your daughter has explained your telepathic abilities.

column2: I'm indebted to your mother for the fine counselor.
column3: I'm indebted to your mother for the fine counselor.

column2: Oh, please don't let me keep you from doing your duty.
column3: Oh, please don't let me keep you from doing your duty.

column2: Oh, I'm sure I find them perfectly pleasant.
column3: Oh, I'm sure I find them perfectly pleasant.

column2: We hope you find the room comfortable.
column3: We hope you find the room comfortable.

column2: I'll see what I can do.
column3: I'll see what I can do.

column2: And now, if you will excuse me, I'm sure the two of you have a lot to talk about.
column3: And now, if you will excuse me, I'm sure the two of you have a lot to talk about.

column2: Are you saying you believe it to be hostile?
column3: Are you saying you believe it to be hostile?

column2: Then let's hope it doesn't become a defense matter.
column3: Then let's hope it doesn't become a defense matter.

column2: I trust my concern over the problems of ship's counselor Troy are not based merely on losing a highly valuable crew member.
column3: I trust my concern over the problems of ship's counselor Troy are not based merely on losing a highly valuable crew member.

column2: But it seems to me that she's trapped by a custom of her homeworld, which the facts of 24th century life have made unwise and unworkable.
column3: But it seems to me that she's trapped by a custom of her homeworld, which the facts of 24th century life have made unwise and unworkable.

column2: Let's take a look at it.
column3: Let's take a look at it.

column2: They must not be permitted to destroy us.
column3: They must not be permitted to destroy us.

column2: It has been believed the Tyrellian race was extinct.
column3: It has been believed the Tyrellian race was extinct.

column2: An assumption contradicted now by the sight of one of their vessels approaching Haven.
column3: An assumption contradicted now by the sight of one of their vessels approaching Haven.

column2: Go on with your briefing, Mr.
column3: Go on with your briefing, Mr.

column2: Can you identify the origin of the infection, Doctor?
column3: Can you identify the origin of the infection, Doctor?

column2: And it was believed that the last Tarelian ship was destroyed eight years ago by the Alcians.
column3: And it was believed that the last Tarelian ship was destroyed eight years ago by the Alcians.

column2: Which creates a very difficult problem for the Enterprise.
column3: Which creates a very difficult problem for the Enterprise.

column2: Our treaty requires us to protect Haven, and Federation policy requires that we assist life forms in need.
column3: Our treaty requires us to protect Haven, and Federation policy requires that we assist life forms in need.

column2: I shall want you to help me find some answers.
column3: I shall want you to help me find some answers.

column2: However, there will be ample time for your second assignment.
column3: However, there will be ample time for your second assignment.

column2: The pre-joining announcement of Councillor Diana Troi.
column3: The pre-joining announcement of Councillor Diana Troi.

column2: Well, yes, of course, if all parties request it.
column3: Well, yes, of course, if all parties request it.

column2: No matter, he is highly adept in the act of sign language.
column3: No matter, he is highly adept in the act of sign language.

column2: Ladies and gentlemen, it is a Starfleet tradition that at social gatherings disputes are not permitted.
column3: Ladies and gentlemen, it is a Starfleet tradition that at social gatherings disputes are not permitted.

column2: I hereby declare, therefore, all disagreements resolved.
column3: I hereby declare, therefore, all disagreements resolved.

column2: And may this union be a productive one.
column3: And may this union be a productive one.

column2: Considering the rate at which you imbibe, sir, is your lineage at all mixed with human?
column3: Considering the rate at which you imbibe, sir, is your lineage at all mixed with human?

column2: All attempts at warning off the Turalyon ship have failed.
column3: All attempts at warning off the Turalyon ship have failed.

column2: They still refuse to communicate, and I'm growing concerned.
column3: They still refuse to communicate, and I'm growing concerned.

column2: How can you be certain they're receiving it?
column3: How can you be certain they're receiving it?

column2: We are aware of that, Electorine.
column3: We are aware of that, Electorine.

column2: We will not fire on them, Electorine.
column3: We will not fire on them, Electorine.

column2: Then we can't delay any longer.
column3: Then we can't delay any longer.

column2: Do we have him secured, Lieutenant?
column3: Do we have him secured, Lieutenant?

column2: Can they beam out to the planet?
column3: Can they beam out to the planet?

column2: Sir, our concern is with the threat your vessel poses to the planet below if you're still carrying the infection that destroyed your world.
column3: Sir, our concern is with the threat your vessel poses to the planet below if you're still carrying the infection that destroyed your world.

column2: All of us that are left, Captain.
column3: All of us that are left, Captain.

column2: If you come here because of the legend about Planet Haven miraculously healing the sick...
column3: If you come here because of the legend about Planet Haven miraculously healing the sick...

column2: This is not our planet, sir.
column3: This is not our planet, sir.

column2: But I will present your needs to those who do govern this world.
column3: But I will present your needs to those who do govern this world.

column2: Crusher had me set the coordinates.
column3: Crusher had me set the coordinates.

column2: Miller, if I could have prevented this, I would...
column3: Miller, if I could have prevented this, I would...

column2: Take us out of here, Mr.
column3: Take us out of here, Mr.

column2: And I'm happy that yours is here with us, Counselor.
column3: And I'm happy that yours is here with us, Counselor.
